actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to provide a payment for certain protected employees to insure that such employees were not disadvantaged between April 1 and September 30, 1976, with respect to preretirement life and medical insurance benefits.

summary.text: Amends the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to direct the Consolidated Rail Corporation to pay specified employees a sum to insure that such employees were not disadvantaged by deprivation of employment between April 1 and September 30, 1976, with respect to pre-retirement life and medical insurance benefits. Excludes such sum from the aggregate amount of paid-out benefits reimbursable by the Railroad Retirement Board.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to provide a payment for certain protected employees to insure that such employees were not disadvantaged between April 1 and September 30, 1976, with respect to preretirement life and medical insurance benefits.
